other_tests.findings: Suggestive of Riedel's thyroiditis (RT) or fibrous variant of Hashimoto’s thyroiditis.
Diagnosis of Riedel’s thyroiditis confirmed; thyroid gland was woody hard and fibrotic with no visible normal tissue.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperative treatment with glucocorticoids resulted in improvement.

other_tests.findings: Normalization of mental status; severe hypocalcemia (1.4 mmol/liter) and low ionized calcium (0.6 mmol/liter).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Persistent low normal calcium levels on adequate calcium and calcitriol regimen.

other_tests.findings: Severe right carotid stenosis related to extrinsic compression by a mass.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved after aggressive treatment with glucocorticoids.
